Hostlayer is here to provide you with reliable, stable and affordable web hosting

services. We offer hosting to a large variety of clients ranging from personal websites to large business websites.

Virtual Private Servers (VPS) are the very latest in Linux Technology, power by the

robust Virtuozzo Control Center. A VPS will provide you with the freedom, space and access of a dedicated server at

a fraction of the cost. The VPS Servers will allow you to install and maintain your own line of software while

providing you with root access, reboot management and even full VPS restore capabilities.

** ALL VPS SERVERS ARE FULLY MANAGED, ANY NEEDED SOFTWARE, CHANGES, ETC ARE DONE FREE OF CHARGE! **
